selected_quotes: Why can't #economics explain our world economy?
'Conventional economics has no tools with which to analyse phenomena like Wikipedia the gift economy'
Making sense of gift and other hybrid forms of economy in the #digital age @ElderVass @Conversatio…
Capitalism has changed, and economics can't explain it
The market #economy is largely absent from the #digital economy, says

news.title: Our world is not a pure market economy, and economics can't explain it
news.summary: We tend to take it for granted that our economy is a market economy. Mainstream economics is particularly committed to that idea.

news.title: Economics could be overlooking this important aspect of our economy

facebook.title: Our world is not a pure market economy, and economics can't explain it
facebook.summary: I think this article gives some insight into why 'women's work' isn't valued. Much of what we do is part of the 'gift economy' and therefore can't be measured in traditional economic terms.
